newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: Lithuanian 182-day T-bill rate inch up to 9.76 pct.
newsitem.headline: Lithuanian 182-day T-bill rate inch up to 9.76 pct.

text.p: The average yield at an auction of Lithuanian 182-day T-bills on Tuesday rose slightly to 9.76 percent from 9.63 percent as demand failed to meet supply, the central bank said.
All amounts are in millions litas.
MATURITY AVG YIELD LAST TIME MIN/MAX ISSUE BID SOLD
Settlement date for the auction is February 7, and the bills mature on August 8.
The next auction is on February 11 when 40 million litas of 91-day T-bills will be issued.
